QuestData.Title: The Fate of Gordawg
QuestData.Description: Looming monstrously between us and the inner chamber is the great fury we have sought to return to the Throne of Elements.$b$bGordawg stands before us enthralled; a slave to the pale and their mysterious master. My heart is heavy with grief to see such a great creature mindless and enslaved by evil.$b$bThere is no going back, in order to push forward you must go through Gordawg.$b$bIt pains me, but Gordawg must be slain.$b$bWhen the deed is done, we will return the fury's heart to the Throne of Elements.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Death is the only way to free the great fury from Cho'gall's grasp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Heart of the Fury.
QuestData.RewardText: Gordawg was a mighty ally. The elements will mourn the loss of the fury, but death was the only answer. Gordawg would not have wished to stay a slave to evil.$b$bThough Gordawg is no more, the heart of a fury is eternal and unbreakable. In time, this brightly glowing heart will take shape into a new earthen fury.$b$bSuch is the cycle of life upon the Elemental Plateau.
